item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (31 points | 6 comments)
2. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (16 points | 2 comments)
3. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (15 points | no comments)
4. frood, an Alpine initramfs NAS (14 points | 2 comments)
5. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (16 points | no comments)
6. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (56 points | 23 comments)
7. Alpine Linux 3.21 (23 points | 3 comments)
8. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (12 points | no comments)
9. Reversing Anti-Cheat's Detection-Generation Cycle With Configurable Hallucinations (15 points | no comments)
10. The Acton Programming Language (7 points | 2 comments)
11. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (16 points | 6 comments)
12. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (28 points | 15 comments)
13. Structured binding upgrades in C++26 (16 points | 6 comments)
14. NAVAL GUN Fire Control System software is written in C++, says job listing (4 points | 8 comments)
15. “Communicating Chorrectly with a Choreography” is out (3 points | 1 comment)
16. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (7 points | 4 comments)
17. How to Pronounce Chinese Names a Little Better (3 points | no comments)
18. This Month in Redox - November 2024 (4 points | no comments)
19. std::map with pointers as keys (3 points | no comments)
20. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (49 points | 22 comments)
21. You can’t get more adversarial than PvP MMORPGs (12 points | no comments)
22. “This is Just a Prototype”: How Ethics Are Ignored in Software Startup-Like Environments (7 points | no comments)
23. Pessimistic or Optimistic Concurrency Control? Lessons Learned from Real-World Customer Scenarios (1 points | no comments)
24. First impressions of the new Amazon Nova LLMs (via a new llm-bedrock plugin) (18 points | 9 comments)
25. Compressed Random-Access Trees for Spatially Coherent Data (2007) (5 points | no comments)
